[`Vault`](../Vault) › [`cachedRead`](./cachedRead)

## Vault.cachedRead() method

Read the content of a plaintext file stored inside the vault Use this if you only want to display the content to the user. If you want to modify the file content afterward use [Vault.read()](./read)

**Signature:**

```typescript
cachedRead(file: TFile): Promise<string>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter         | Type                | Description |
| ----------------- | ------------------- | ----------- |
| <code>file</code> | [`TFile`](../TFile) |             |

**Returns:**

`Promise<string>`
